articles.title: Serious mistakes, but the club's silence is also not good. Lock down the Champions League then targeted purchases. Watch out for backlash
articles.summary: It would be wrong to reduce everything to refereeing episodes, and equally wrong not to consider VAR errors just for the sake of going against Max Allegri. When analyzing Milan's current moment, both factors must be taken into account.

articles.title: CorSport on Milan: "Tris for the Champions League spot"
articles.summary: After the defeat against Parma, Milan must look forward. The Devil's objective must be what Max Allegri has always declared, qualification for the next Champions League.

articles.title: La Gazzetta returns to Milan-Parma and the refereeing errors: "Poisoned blocks"
articles.summary: Milan has not yet digested the home defeat against Parma. And not for the defeat itself, but for how it happened and for the obvious refereeing errors that affected the match.

articles.summary: Milan is not going through an easy period. First the draw against Como, then the defeat against Parma and a -10 from Inter which hurts.

articles.summary: So much fear for Ruben Loftus-Cheek. The Rossoneri midfielder was seriously injured after the aerial collision with Corvi in ​​the match against Parma.

articles.summary: Complicated days for Milan, who after the home defeat against Parma found themselves 10 points behind Inter. Another bad news comes from Ruben Loftus-Cheek, who underwent surgery after the bad clash with Corvi.

articles.title: Cheerful, it's your turn: Max the commander to reach the final goal
articles.summary: Complicated days for Milan, who found themselves -10 behind Inter after the bad performances against Como and Parma. And several refereeing errors, because after every one happens to you, repeatedly, it is right to mention them.

articles.summary: Between today, tomorrow and Thursday the European cups return. We start today with the Champions League which will complete the playoff round with the return matches between this evening and tomorrow.
